Title: Does transcranial direct current stimulation affect post-stressor intrusive memories and rumination? an experimental analogue study
Author: Voss, Maria; Ehring, Thomas; Wolkenstein, Larissa
ResultSummary: Both conditions did not significantly in terms of emotional distress
Notes_fromMo: How to classify the tdcs study as behavioural, neural etc? Used an intrusion questionnaire not previously used in other studies~ is this study eligible for our meta? Also do we code distress as it doesn't ask for distress associated with each intrusion; consult dr. hu on classification of study type, consult dr. hu about whether to code total ies-r/ies or just the intrusion subscale score; osf pre-registration; do we code for vividness or not include in the pre-reg

Title: Neuromodulation of Visual Cortex Reduces the Intensity of Intrusive Memories
